test_message: Applicant thin-file case: No credit history found, SSN verified, has 2-year phone history with AT&T, utility account active for 18 months at current address, no ChexSystems flags

reasoning_chain: Applicant has no traditional credit history, but SSN has been verified.
Telco account with AT&T is active for 24 months with a good payment history.
Utility account at current address active for 18 months, demonstrating 93% payment reliability.
Geolocation verifies applicant stability at the listed address for 18 months.
No negative reports or flags found in ChexSystems.
Alternative data sources confirm applicant's identity and payment reliability, supporting a recommendation for approval.
